Text: And that's how...

the warlock Shadow was driven from the capital by
Princess Iris and Beatrix the War Goddess.

However, the whereabouts of Princess Rose, who
murdered her own father, King Geerk of the Oriana
Kingdom, remains a complete mystery.

No details on the secret society the "Shadow Garden"
which Shadow is part of, have been forthcoming
either. The knight orders are making every effort to
apprehend who they believe to be the primary culprit...
Shadow...
I swear, by my hand...
Heheh, heheheh...
You've failed, Perv Asshat...
I...beg your forgiveness...

However, so long as we retain our grip upon the royal
family, the girl cannot remain hidden forever.

With the king gone, Oriana will be rocked by great
turmoil in the days to come. This is something she
will be unable to ignore. She will undoubtedly return.
And when she does...

I pray that you are right... Do not disappoint me any
further, Perv Asshat.
Understood.
This is no place for me! I'm leaving!

So what, you gonna run off somewhere with your tail
between your legs?
I am not running! Just changing direction!

Don't let yourself get too hung up on it. There are
many out there with power beyond our understanding.
And besides, you're still young...
Don't worry.
I am not one to sit still..
...I see.
The whistle blows, announcing the train's departure.
I never found her, either. Nothing went my way.

But I did have some fun along the way, so all I can
do is keep at it, slow and steady...

So we must apply innovations to every issue in our
plan, committing the best benefits we can within our
meager budget...

The Knight Order is in a frenzy to apprehend
Master Shadow.

Which is precisely as our lord intendedâ€”set himself
up as a decoy to keep them too fixated on his doings
here in Midgar to worry about incidents in Oriana.

And we have established a proper means of
communication with our operatives there?
Yes, Lady Eta has scrounged something together.

Scrounged together... In that case I suppose we had
better get over there in person as soon as possible.

Doot-doo-doo. Doot-doot-doo-doo. Doot-doot-doot-doot-
doot-doo-doo.

Master Shadow is taking an active hand now. We need
to settle our affairs here quickly.
I will assign more agents to the Lawless City.
We must do our absolute best for our lord.
Surely.

Arrangements for our cover activities will be
flawless.
Boss man?
*gasp*
Man, how long do we gotta use these temp buildings?

Hey, you heard? Word is Mitsugoshi's funding the
reconstruction!

No way! Maybe that means we'll get some new uniforms
to go with our new academy!
So what happened to Skel again?

Oh, him? He said somethin' about "going away for
awhile on a part-time job."
But the new semester's already started...
Dammit, when the hell am I ever gonna see land again?
Hey! Get yer ass in gear, greenhorn! No lollygaggin'!
Eep! Sorry! Sorry!
...I feel a storm coming on.

Anyway, all that stuff at the Bushin Festival was
pretty crazy, huh?
That stuff?
Yeah, you know, the warlock Shadow.
The warlock Shadow.

I was still coming back from home, but that magic
glow over the capital was really freaky, like someone
had opened the gates of hell.

Aw man, if only I'd been in the city. I bet I
could've found a terrified girl to comfort
in my arms.
Guess I went a little overboard...
I'd better play it more low key...
